directions: In a bowl, mix the garbanzo beans, onion, lemon juice, garlic, oregano, salt, black pepper, and cayenne pepper. Stir in the olive oil, and adjust seasonings to taste. Mix in the peas. Cover, and marinate in the refrigerator at least 1 hour.
ingredients: 1 (15.5 ounce) can garbanzo beans, drained and rinsed
¼ cup frozen green peas, thawed
title: Simple Garbanzos
